name: Gamedev Graveyard
description:
Sometimes unfinished projects can be a burden, this is my attempt to get some resolution by giving these games a funeral. I encourage you to do the same and make a page like this for your abandoned projects.

Each time I let go of a project I will bury it here, for others to download and play. Hopefully they'll stop haunting me now.

(source code included)

If you do make your own page like this, please tell me, I would love to see/play your unfinished games.

@NylePudding
